data.what_is: Appster is a full scale mobile & web app development firm with 390 people across 3 continents & offices in Silicon Valley (San Francisco), Melbourne (Australia), New York & India.
data.product_description: Appster is a full scale mobile & web app development firm with 390 people across 3 continents & offices in Silicon Valley (San Francisco), Melbourne (Australia), New York & India.

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Appster helped with:
Just Save engaged Appster to develop a responsive web and iOS and android app. The software designed was not fit for purpose and Appster agreed to refund our $60,000 deposit. Appster had utilised our deposit for other clients developments and now need 6 months to repay.

What do you like best about Appster?
Appster were unable to complete the project and now are unable to repay our deposit in full and have need to go on a payment plan.

What do you dislike about Appster?
Arrogance of management that believe they are entitled to spend our money and repay a holding deposit over 6 months

Recommendations to others considering Appster:
Buyer beware a 6 months payment plan to refund a $60,000 deposit is very concerning. I could not recommend Appster to any prospective consumer.

initial_reviews.review_title: A superb one-stop-shop for app development!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Appster helped with:
Appster developed Mittcute's iOS app from start to finish, including graphic design and primary testing. Mittcute is a social activities app where users connect through activity interest.

What do you like best about Appster?
Appster showcases an excellent communication structure with a friendly and professional approach to problem solving and management. Appster's agile methodology makes it easy to coordinate budget allocation and fundraising, while their concern for customer satisfaction is evident in helping to develop a cost effective MVP, constantly asking how they can improve your experience, and always being a click away.

What do you dislike about Appster?
I haven't found anything I dislike about Appster. The tricky thing can be the time differences at times, yet it can come to an advantage as well. It's all a matter of organization and perspective, their transparency and clear work structure comes in handy to make the use of time differences a plus.

Recommendations to others considering Appster:
Know what you want and don't be afraid to ask any questions. Besides having a friendly and knowledgeable staff, they are transparent and passionate about their work and they want you to feel passionate and knowledgeable about your project too.
